ModMetaData.name: AdvancedMechBooster单格先进机械超频仪
ModMetaData.author: 幽月琉璃Luna
ModMetaData.description: 先进机械超频仪mod，添加了一种占地仅单格、范围更大的高级机械超频仪，需要机制机械族科技解锁 [*]Added an advanced mech booster on a 1×1 cell. [*]The advanced mech booster has a working range of 12.9 (9.9 in the original) and needs to be unlocked by researching UltraMechtech.
